meaningMnemonic:
This radical is the same as the kanji. It means <radical>good</radical>.

Just in case you don't remember this, here's the kanji meaning mnemonic: A <radical>drop</radical> of water to a <radical>root</radical> is <kanji>good</kanji>. It's good for the roots to grow and live and thrive. And what's good for roots is good for our plants and us humans too.
